name: PPG INDUSTRIES, INC., Narula Real Estate Associates, LLC, and Alfred Smith, Plaintiffs-Respondents, v. J. GOLDENBERG INC., Defendant-Petitioner, and State of New Jersey and the Central Railroad Company n/k/a Consolidated Rail Corporation, Defendants.

court.name: New Jersey Court of Errors and Appeals

casebody.head_matter:
PPG INDUSTRIES, INC., Narula Real Estate Associates, LLC, and Alfred Smith, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
J. GOLDENBERG INC., Defendant-Petitioner,
and
State of New Jersey and the Central Railroad Company n/k/a Consolidated Rail Corporation, Defendants.
079525
C-80 Sept. Term 2017
Supreme Court of New Jersey.
September 22, 2017
ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION.
To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:
A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000077-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;
It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
